mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM reviews r, bookings b, pooms p, users u WHERE p.no = b.poom_no AND r.booking_no = b.no AND r.user_no = u.no AND poom_no = #{no}

SELECT r.no, r.user_no userNo, r.booking_no bookingNo, r.content, r.score, r.regdate, u.profile_img profileImg, u.name userName FROM reviews r, bookings b, pooms p, users u WHERE p.no = b.poom_no AND r.booking_no = b.no AND r.user_no = u.no AND poom_no = #{no} ORDER BY r.regdate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews(no, user_no, booking_no, content, score, regdate) VALUES(reviews_seq.nextval, #{userNo}, #{bookingNo}, #{content}, #{score}, systimestamp)
